name.ja: フラッシュメモリー・フュージョン

requirement.en: When a monster(s) on your field is destroyed by an opponent's attack or their card effect.

effect.en: Fusion Summon a monster that lists "Blue-Fang Burst Dragon" or "Red-Boot Boost Dragon" as material by shuffling monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck as material. Then, if you activated this card during your turn, your opponent can Special Summon 1 monster from their Graveyard to their field in face-up Attack Position.
